subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Loren Roberts capped a bogey-free 66 with a 2-foot birdie putt on the 18th hole, taking a two-shot lead over Scott Hoch after two rounds of the Senior Players Championship in Timonium, Md. The tournament is the Champions Tour’s final major of the year. Roberts, who made four birdies, was at seven-under 133. Hoch shot a 68.
